original_title: El Chapo and the Curse of the Pirate Zombies
overview: A sexy soap opera actress, a Hollywood movie star, a has-been tabloid journalist, a Mafia Boss and a drug lord fight zombie pirates.
tagline: The world's most powerful force has just been unleashed...And also, there are zombies.
title: El Chapo and the Curse of the Pirate Zombies
